definition: to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: But people for money to do if the terrible thing shouldn't.
sentences.chinese: 但人们如果为了钱去做伤天害理的事就不应该了。

sentences.english: How could he live peacefully with such a wicked crime on his conscience?
sentences.chinese: 他做了这样伤天害理的事怎么能过太平的日子呢？

sentences.english: I want to help, but there is a tyranny involved.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮你的忙，但是这牵涉到一桩伤天害理的事。

sentences.english: Would our Chinesev government do something as impudent and outrageous as peddle munitions?
sentences.chinese: 贩卖军火伤天害理的事情怎么是我们中国政府做的呢？

definition: to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
to imitate the dog and steal chicken (idiom)/to pilfer/to dally with women/to have affairs
to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson
worse than a beast/to behave immorally
to oppress the people/to act tyrannically
